text: Big news day, Suitors! You might want to clear your afternoon for this one... USA Network and Universal Cable Productions announced today that Suits has been renewed for an eighth season. Show creator and executive producer Aaron Korsh is set to return, as are stars Gabriel Macht as Harvey Specter, Sarah Rafferty as Donna Paulsen, Rick Hoffman as Louis Litt, and newly - minted series regular Dulé Hill as Alex Williams.
